name: VCB-Studio分享论坛
introduction:
字幕资源搜索,可以搜索一些动漫字幕资源
*该搜索源需登录*

search.list: function Main(html){var formhash = jsoup(html,'[name=formhash]@attr->value');html = httpRequest('https://bbs.vcb-s.com/search.php?mod=forum@post->formhash='+formhash+'&srchtxt=[$key]&searchsubmit=yes@charset->UTF-8@header->content-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.111 Safari/537.36@header->referer:https://bbs.vcb-s.com@header->origin:https://bbs.vcb-s.com');return jsoups(html,'#threadlist > ul > li');}
search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'h3.xs3 > a');}
